<]" ready:"{{$:/plugins/commons/file-uploads/images/upload}}" wait:"âŒ›" finish:"ðŸ§¼">> <$button popup=<> tooltip="download" class="tc-btn-invisible icon"> {{$:/core/images/download-button}} <$reveal type="popup" state=<> class="tc-drop-down" position="below"> <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-template]]"> <$let plugin={{!!title}} pluginType={{!!plugin-draft}} namePrefix={{{ $:/[{!!plugin-draft}]s/ +[join[]] }}} pluginName={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}} publisherName={{{ [{!!author}!match[]]~[{!!title}trimtrimtrim[/]] }}} pluginVersion={{{ [{!!version}!match[]]~0.0.0 }}} timedate=<> notEmpty="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix!][get[extra-tiddlers]enlist-input[]] :filter[has[title]]" exportBtns="[!search:title:some[demo]]" > {{{ [[$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton]tagging[]filterfilter]||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body/default }}} <$link> <$button class="icon tc-btn-invisible" > <$transclude tiddler={{{ [{!!title}] "/icon"+[join[]] }}}>{{$:/core/images/plugin-generic-plugin}} <$text text={{!!name}}/> (<$text text={{!!version}}/>) : {{!!description}} {{||$:/core/ui/Buttons/edit}} <$genesis $type={{{ [{!!demo}!match[]then[a]else[template]] }}} href={{!!demo}} title="demo">demo
<$list filter="[subfilter{$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/settings!!ReadOnlyFilter}!match[true]]" variable="ignore"> <> <> ", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins", "modified": "20230420203222757" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/button/upload": { "created": "20230419102035217", "text": "\define toggle-tiddler(tiddler) <$action-setmultiplefields $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> $fields="text disabled-text" $values="[{$tiddler$!!disabled-text}] [{$tiddler$!!text}]"/> \end \define package-plugins(plugins-filter) <$list filter=<<__plugins-filter__>> > <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-template]]"> <$let plugin={{!!title}} pluginType={{!!plugin-draft}} namePrefix={{{ $:/[{!!plugin-draft}]s/ +[join[]] }}} pluginName={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}} publisherName={{{ [{!!author}!match[]]~[{!!title}trimtrimtrim[/]] }}} pluginVersion={{{ [{!!version}!match[]]~0.0.0 }}} timedate=<> notEmpty="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix!][get[extra-tiddlers]enlist-input[]] :filter[has[title]]" fileName={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] "_" [] [[.json]] +[join[]] }}} > <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info]]"> <$let plugin-title=<> currentTiddler={{{ [addsuffix[/plugin.info]] }}} > <$linkcatcher><> <$wikify name="JSON" text="<$transclude mode='block' tiddler='$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template' />" output="text"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> tags="plugin-upload" type="text/plain"/> \end \define send-plugins() <$list filter="[{$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath}!match[plugins]]"> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath" text="plugins"/> <$list filter="[{$:/GitHub/Username}is[blank]]"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-upload-tiddlers" $param="[[plugin-upload]tagging[]]"/> \end \define upload-plugins(plugins-filter) <$list filter="[{$:/config/AutoSave}!is[blank]]"><> <> <> \end \define clean-up() <> <> <$action-setmultiplefields $tiddler="$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath" $fields="text original-text" $values="[{$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath!!original-text}][[]]" /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[[plugin-upload]tagging[]]"/> <$wikify name="site-title" text={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-wiki" $param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}} filename=<>/> \end \define upload-button(plugins-filter,ready:"Upload plugins",wait:"Uploading.. Please wait a bit..",finish:"Upload completed. Click again to clean up the wiki.",class:"tc-btn-invisible") <$list filter="[subfilter{$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/settings!!ReadOnlyFilter}!match[true]]"> <$button class=<<__class__>> > <$list filter="[tag[plugin-upload]count[]match[0]]">$ready$ <> <$list filter="[tag[plugin-upload]has[text]limit[1]]">$wait$ <$list filter="[tag[plugin-upload]has[text]count[]match[0]]:filter[[plugin-upload]tagging[]]">$finish$<> \end", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/button/upload", "modified": "20230420204305860", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/readme": { "created": "20230420194209916", "text": "The setup used on https://plm.tiddlyhost.com to create and distribute plugins. Adds a few features to the excellent [[Gatha|$:/plugins/kookma/gatha]] plugin: * Upload to GitHub button, using the [[file-uploads|$:/plugins/commons/file-uploads]] plugin * Some tweaks to the UI", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/readme", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20230420200352727" }} }
